column5: All afternoon they have been reporting waterskiing in Barrie. Are they out of their minds? Or am I missing something?
Why not.. there's open water ! The folks today probably use dry suits, not something we had when I was 15 !
Not a good idea, just after ice out, well maybe Terry would do it!
There must have been some event going on. The radio station Rock 95 keep mentioning people being out on the water and were dedicating songs to them.
I guess we all have our thrills, not for this boy though brrrrrrrrrrr
We get kite surfers and surfers up here on Superior year round when there's open water. No big deal.
